modName: Seraphie - Lv1 Nord save file in Riverwood
summary: My attempt at creating a unique look for Nords
descriptionHtml:
Lv.1, is in Riverwood so you skip the boring Helgen part, picked Ralof path (Stormcloaks) and almost no quests completed except starting one.

Here\\\'s a list of mods you will require to get the exact same look, you should follow the same order when activating mods and always press \\\"Yes\\\" when asked to overwrite:

1. Enhanced Character Edit by tktk1 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?
2. UNP Replacer Configuration Package by sillumlt - skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20884/?
3. univision face by dd2501 (UNP version) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569/?
4. Racemenu by expired 6978 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/?
5. SG Hairpack - You have to find it yourself...however, I must note here that I was using Apachii Skyhair until very recently which complements this character very well.

ENB used is a private customization that I will be releasing soon I hope once I fix a few things.

All credits go to the authors of these wonderful mods that made this possible. You have my utmost gratitude!

Please endorse if you like and let me know if you need any help. Also, you have full permission to distribute and alter this character to your liking as long as it stays on the nexus.
author: pedobait
